[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Simulate killing monsters.

**Usage**

- `/kill name:<string> quantity:<integer> [catacombs:<boolean>] [master:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The monster you want to simulate killing. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | Yes | The quantity you want to simulate. | - |
| `catacombs` | `boolean` | No | Killing in catacombs? | - |
| `master` | `string` | No | On slayer task from a master? | - |
